Here we're using our YAML declarations to control the OJS<->Shiny communication.

## Observable

```{ojs}
x = now;
viewof y = Inputs.range();
`Look, we're using Shiny's 'xx' here! Its value is ${xx}`;
`Look, we're using Shiny's 'yy' here! Its value is ${yy}`
```

## Shiny

```{r, context="server"}
source("shinyojs.R")

xx <- shiny::reactive({
  input$x / 100
})
exportOJS(xx, yy = reactive(input$y * 100))
```
